suggest.ext-intl: Required for most features of Zend\I18n; included in default builds of PHP
suggest.zendframework/zend-eventmanager: You should install this package to use the events in the translator
suggest.zendframework/zend-filter: You should install this package to use the provided filters
suggest.zendframework/zend-validator: You should install this package to use the provided validators
suggest.zendframework/zend-view: You should install this package to use the provided view helpers
